overview:
Based in New York City, Aly is a software product (sometime program) management professional.

Aly leads product design and development at Outside.in.

Most recently, Aly was Lead Program Manager at Microsoft Startup Labs in Cambridge, MA incubating real-time productivity experiences. Before that, he helped launch leading how-to video start-up Howcast.com as Director of Consumer and Trade Marketing in New York City. Aly spent 5 years at Microsoft as a program manager and product planner building consumer and advertiser offerings for Windows Live, MSN and Microsoft Advertising.

Aly holds degrees in political economy from the University of Cambridge and the University of Waterloo.
